abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz\' attack damage and applying attack modifiers.
abilities.name: Burning Barrage
abilities.notes: Bonus Attack Range increases the length of Burning Barrage.

abilities.desc: Imbues Clinkz\'s arrows with fire for extra damage.
abilities.name: Searing Arrows
abilities.notes: The damage is directly added to Clinkz' attack damage, as physical damage.

abilities.desc: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items. 1 Burning Army Skeletons are created when leaving invisibility.
abilities.name: Skeleton Walk

abilities.desc: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz\' damage, use his current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Attack range is equal to Clinkz\'s attack range.
abilities.name: Burning Army

abilities.desc: Clinkz consumes the target enemy creep or friendly creep, gaining max health and damage based on its maximum health. Does not take Clinkz out of Skeleton Walk.
abilities.name: Death Pact
abilities.notes: When the duration ends, max HP returns to normal, but current HP stays the same.
